structural_units.address:
Nooruse 1
50411 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: To understand the effect of polymorphisms of genes encoding drug metabolism enzymes, transporters and receptors of drugs on the outcome of drug therapy.
description.et: Mõista ravimite metabolismi ensüüme, transportereid ja retseptoreid kodeerivate geenide polümorfismide mõju farmakoteraapia tulemustele.

objectives.en: To understand the effect of polymorphisms of genes encoding drug metabolism enzymes, transporters and receptors of drugs on the outcome of drug therapy.
objectives.et: Mõista ravimite metabolismi ensüüme, transportereid ja retseptoreid kodeerivate geenide polümorfismide mõju farmakoteraapia tulemustele.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who has passed the subject:
* knows the principles of CYP metabolism
* can give practical recommendations for pharmacotherapy adjustments regarding actionable gene-drug and gene-drug-disease interactions
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab anda praktilisi soovitusi raviskeemide kohandamiseks seoses geeni-ravimi ja geeni-ravimi-haiguse koostoimetega

learning_outcomes.en: * knows the main principles of pharmacogenomics
